tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    fov_angle FLOAT,
    control_scheme VARCHAR(50),
    game_difficulty VARCHAR(20),
    last_played TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  age INT,
  location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE game_preferences (
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  game_id INT,
  difficulty_level VARCHAR(20),
  favorite_genre VARCHAR(50),
  last_played TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE interaction_history (
  interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT REFERENCES user_profiles(user_id),
  game_id INT REFERENCES game_preferences(game_id),
  interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
  interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    favorite_genre VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE user_behavior (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(20),
    behavior_description TEXT,
    behavior_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE game_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    review_rating FLOAT
);
